# get input
a, b = map(int, input().split())

# print sum
print(a + b)

a, b = input().split()
print(int(a)+int(b))


def main():
    a, b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]  
    print(a+b) 
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

print(2+2)


def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a + b)
    
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    a, b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]  # a = 1, b = 2
    print(a+b)  # 3
    
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
